summary: Changes it so that Housecarls use their holds armor and shield instead of the generic steel shield.  Best used with Cities Have Various Guard Outfits.
descriptionHtml:
Loved nockchaas Every city have various guard outfits mod, but felt that it made housecarls standard steel armor seem bland and generic.  This simply changes it so that housecarls now wear their respective holds armor as well as use the shield with their holds crest by default.

You must have the mod installed before you are assigned your housecarl.  The console command \"resetinventory\" should work if you have been assigned the housecarls already.

Thanks to traiii I believe I have now gotten Hearthfire housecarls armor changed as well.  I have included two optional files.  One which changes all three of the new housecarls armor, and one which only changes Gregor and Valdimar.  The reason for this was because I wasn\'t sure how adding a default shield to Rayaa would effect her ability to dual wield and figured that I\'d just cover my butt either way.

Thanks for checking it out!
author: AlecZeal1989
